title: NPD's Cohen: Department Stores Must Change Their Game (Audio)
itunes:title: NPD's Cohen: Department Stores Must Change Their Game (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Marshall Cohen, Chief Retail Analyst at NPD Group, for analysis of retail sales numbers, and the recent disappointing earnings from the sector. Broadcasting live from Elbow Beach Bermuda.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
